amendment.description: To support certain youth organizations, including the Boy Scouts of America and Girl Scouts of America, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1342 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 204.

action.text: Amendment SA 1342 proposed by Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S8602-8607; text: CR S8602-8603) To support certain youth organizations, including the Boy Scouts of America and Girl Scouts of America, and for other purposes.
